Recommended Bug Title: Integer Divide By Zero starting at JPEG2000!ShowPlugInSaveOptions_W+0x00000000000082ea (Hash=0x3a581385.0x548935b5)

This is a divide by zero, and is probably not exploitable.
0:000> 
0:000> r
rax=000000000024006e rbx=000000425b2f6850 rcx=0000000000000000
rdx=0000000000000000 rsi=0000000000008000 rdi=000000425b2f6858
rip=00007ffd52a2dc1a rsp=000000425b2f6740 rbp=0000000000000084
 r8=0000000000000000  r9=0000000000008007 r10=0000000000000000
r11=000000425b2f6854 r12=0000000000000001 r13=0000000000000000
r14=0000000000002449 r15=0000000000008007
iopl=0         nv up ei pl nz na pe nc

JPEG2000!ShowPlugInSaveOptions_W+0x82ea:
